text: The Roncador River () is a river of the state of Mato Grosso, Brazil. It is a tributary of the Manso River. ==Course== The Casca River joins the Roncador River in an arm of the Manso Dam. ==See also== *List of rivers of Mato Grosso ==References== ==Sources== * Category:Rivers of Mato Grosso
title: Roncador River (Mato Grosso)
